name: Heterochromia
description:
Thank for your taking interest our Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam Game! 

In this game, you may only use one of the 4 abilites listed below at once. To change the active ability, you just change the colour. The active colour also hides enemies, obstacles and platforms that share the same colour.

Controls:
Right Arrow Key - Move Right (Red)
Left Arrow Key - Move Left (Yellow)
Up Arrow Key - Jump (Green)
Down Arrow Key - Shoot (Orange)

Q - Change colour to red
W- Change colour to yellow
E - Change colour to blue
A - Change colour to green
S - Change colour to orange
